text: Lewis Robert "Lew" Wasserman (March 22, 1913 - June 3, 2002) was an American talent agent and executive. He was manager of MCA, Inc.. He was a mentor to Ronald Reagan and worked closely with Jack Valenti. Wasserman died in Beverly Hills, California from a stroke, aged 89. ==Other websites== * Category:1913 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:American chief executives Category:Businesspeople from Cleveland
title: Lew Wasserman
